snippet: Of late, the mayor and his team have taken to dialing up well-known personages and asking: Would you, could you, might you run for mayor?
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column contends that Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's heavily leaked executive search for a successor is, at best, poor political form.
lead_paragraph: Of late, the mayor and his team have taken to dialing up well-known personages and asking: Would you, could you, might you run for mayor?

headline.seo: As Clock Ticks, Michael R. Bloomberg Is Still Seeking a Worthy Heir
headline.main: As Clock Ticks, Bloomberg Is Still Seeking a Worthy Heir
headline.print_headline: As Clock Ticks, Bloomberg Is Still Seeking A Worthy Heir
